commit.message:
gcse.c (hash_scan_set, [...]): Revert previous change, don't use CALL_P.

2004-06-13  Steven Bosscher <stevenb@suse.de>

	* gcse.c (hash_scan_set, hash_scan_insn, mark_set, mark_oprs_set):
	Revert previous change, don't use CALL_P.

From-SVN: r83080
